sentence.text: The negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II of superoxide metabolic process and ROS on cancer development is only partly explored.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: Recent research published in the Journal of Pathology showed that genetic depletion of any of the superoxide metabolic process subunits cytochrome complex assembly, Cybb, Ncf1, superoxide metabolic process and superoxide metabolic process reduced the formation of lung metastases following intravenous injection of murine tumor cells.
These findings, along with the role of superoxide metabolic process in maintaining self-tolerance, imply that NOX2 is a targetable immune checkpoint in cancer.
